<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/payment/refund"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sends a refund request for a specific payment identified by payment_id.
:::info 🔗 Related Checkout Refund: 
[Request parameters](/docs/guides/checkout_integration#request-parameters-3) · [Response parameters](/docs/guides/checkout_integration#response-parameters-2) · [Test Data](/docs/guides/checkout_integration#testing) · [Callback notification](/docs/guides/checkout_integration#callback-notification) · [Refund hash](/docs/guides/checkout_integration#refund-signature) 
:::

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["merchant_key","payment_id","amount","hash"],"properties":{"merchant_key":{"type":"string","description":"Key for Merchant identification","example":"xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx"},"payment_id":{"type":"string","maxLength":255,"description":"Payment ID (public)","example":"dc66cdd8-d702-11ea-9a2f-0242c0a87002"},"amount":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[1-9][0-9]*\\.?[0-9]{0,2}$","description":"Amount to refund (format XX.XX, no leading zeroes)","example":"0.19"},"hash":{"type":"string","description":"Signature to validate the request. Must be SHA1 of MD5 encoded string (uppercased): payment_id + amount + merchant_pass\n","example":"A1B2C3D4E5F67890123456789ABCDEF123456789"}},"title":"RefundRequest"},"example":{"merchant_key":"xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx","payment_id":"63c781cc-de3d-11eb-a1f1-0242ac130006","amount":"0.10","hash":"A1B2C3D4E5F67890123456789ABCDEF123456789"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Refund request response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["payment_id","result"],"properties":{"payment_id":{"type":"string","maxLength":255,"description":"Transaction ID (public)","example":"dc66cdd8-d702-11ea-9a2f-0242c0a87002"},"result":{"type":"string","description":"Refund request result","example":"accepted"}},"title":"RefundResponse"},"examples":{"accepted":{"summary":"Refund accepted response","value":{"payment_id":"63c781cc-de3d-11eb-a1f1-0242ac130006","result":"accepted"}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - missing or invalid parameters","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error","message"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string","description":"Error code","example":"invalid_request"},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable error message","example":"Missing required parameter 'payment_id'."}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - invalid merchant key or hash","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error","message"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string","description":"Error code","example":"invalid_request"},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable error message","example":"Missing required parameter 'payment_id'."}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
